title: Filter by Age
markdown:
# Filter by Age

Write a SQL query to select all columns from the `users` table where the `age` is greater than 25.

### Table Schema
| Column | Type    | Description |
|--------|---------|-------------|
| id     | INTEGER | Primary Key |
| name   | TEXT    | User Name   |
| age    | INTEGER | User Age    |

### Example
**Input:**
```
+----+-------+-----+
| id | name  | age |
+----+-------+-----+
| 1  | Alice | 30  |
| 2  | Bob   | 20  |
| 3  | Charlie| 35 |
+----+-------+-----+
```

**Output:**
```
+----+-------+-----+
| id | name  | age |
+----+-------+-----+
| 1  | Alice | 30  |
| 3  | Charlie| 35 |
+----+-------+-----+
```
